title: War hero now prisoner No: 0/22032
content: Courtesy: Sunday Times – Pix: Getty Images * Fonseka sleeps on ground and stands in queue for meals * Ranil faces new issues, including Ameratunga’s embarrassing trip to US It was close upon midnight Thursday when former Army Commander Sarath Fonseka was escorted into an isolated cell in Ward “S” at the high security Welikada…
